Minimum Spanning Tree Module¶

This Python module implements the minimum spanning tree functionality for selecting interferometric observations.

pyrate.mst.mst_boolean_array(ifgs)[source]¶

Returns a 3D array of booleans constituting valid interferogram connections in the Minimum Spanning Tree matrix.

Parameters:ifgs (list) – Sequence of interferogram objects
Returns:result: Array of booleans representing valid ifg connections
Return type:ndarray
pyrate.mst.mst_from_ifgs(ifgs)[source]¶

Returns a Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) network from the given interferograms using Kruskal’s algorithm. The MST is calculated using a weighting based on the number of NaN cells in the phase band.

Parameters:ifgs (list) – List of interferogram objects (Ifg class)
Returns:edges: The number of network connections
Return type:int
Returns:is_tree: A boolean that is True if network is a tree
Return type:bool
Returns:ntrees: The number of disconnected trees
Return type:int
Returns:mst_ifgs: Minimum Spanning Tree network of interferograms
Return type:list
pyrate.mst.mst_matrix_networkx(ifgs)[source]¶

Generates MST network for a single pixel for the given ifgs using NetworkX-package algorithms.

Parameters:ifgs (list) – Sequence of interferogram objects
Returns:y: pixel y coordinate
Return type:int
Returns:x: pixel x coordinate
Return type:int
Returns:mst: list of tuples for edges in the minimum spanning tree
Return type:list
pyrate.mst.mst_multiprocessing(tile, ifgs_or_paths, preread_ifgs=None)[source]¶

Wrapper function for calculating MST matrix for a tile

Parameters:
  • tile (ndarray) – Tile class instance
  • ifgs_or_paths (list) – All interferograms paths of the problem. List of strings
  • preread_ifgs (dict) – Dictionary of interferogram metadata
Returns:

mst_tile: MST matrix tile. An array of booleans representing valid ifg connections
Return type:

ndarray
pyrate.mst.mst_parallel(ifgs, params)[source]¶

Wrapper function for calculating MST matrix in non-MPI runs.

Parameters:
  • ifgs (list) – List of interferogram objects (Ifg class)
  • params (dict) – Dictionary of parameters
Returns:

result: 3-dimensional Minimum Spanning Tree matrix
Return type:

ndarray
